entry.title: About
entry.content:
I‚Äôm Seungjun Lee, an AI research engineer dedicated to serve humanity through harnessing innovative engineering. My primary research areas include deep learning, deep generative models, and medical image analysis.

  • Bachelor‚Äôs Degree, Majoring in Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering with a Mechanical Engineering Minor, Seoul National University.

üóæ¬†Experience

üèÜ¬†Honors & awards
